content: i love this cute little baby jacket worked top down on straight needles - and with just 2 sleeve seams to join chose 1 3 or 5 buttons requirements dk yarn ~ around 70g of acrylic dk 4mm needles 1 3 or 5 small buttons gauge / gauge 22sts 4 10cm so sweet **to get this free pattern please click on the https link just below ↓**
